about_the_game:
Endless Strategy, Timeless Play

Whether you're new to chess or a seasoned master, welcome to Chess Infinity—the art of timeless strategy.

Immerse yourself in serene environments, sharpen your skills with an adaptive AI mentor, and connect with players worldwide. 

Chess Infinity ensures every move matters. Every victory is personal, and every moment is rewarding.

Your Personal Chess Mentor

  • Guided Mastery:  Elevate your play with accessible feedback and interactive tutorials designed to make learning intuitive and fun.

  • Visual Learning: Master the game with our optional tactical overlay,  highlighting opportunities and vulnerabilities in real-time, so you can see every move’s potential at a glance.

  • Replay and Reflect: Relive each moment, replay your matches, and analyse your gameplay move by move, sharpening your skills with thoughtful precision.

  • AI Mentor: Learn with Aion, Chess Infinity’s Grandmaster-crafted AI mentor. Aion adapts to your skill level and evolves alongside you, offering just the right challenge—guiding you from beginner to strategic brilliance.

Cross-Platform Play with Seamless Connectivity

  • Challenge friends or face off against global competitors with ease, thanks to Chess Infinity’s cross-platform multiplayer. Its refined Elo matching system ensures you’ll always be paired with a worthy opponent, keeping every match competitive, engaging and rewarding.

Immersive Chess Experience

  • Tactile and Authentic: Every move feels real. From the luxurious chess sets to the intricate detailing of each piece, Chess Infinity delivers unparalleled craftsmanship, bringing the physicality of chess to life in stunning digital form.

  • Breathtaking Worlds: Immerse yourself in 19 beautiful spaces, across 4 exquisite locations. Whether it’s the gentle drift of snow or the warm glow of a setting sun, every match is set against a beautifully crafted backdrop, heightening your sense of place and serenity.

  • Chess Clocks: Enjoy the timelessness of chess, whether you prefer the slow pace of classical matches or the rapid intensity of speed chess. With multiple time controls available both online and offline, every match offers a unique test of your strategic abilities.

Rewarding Progression 

  • Learning Tour: Step into a relaxed, player-friendly journey where it's not about winning. Tackle engaging objectives, refine your strategy, and learn through trial and error with the freedom to undo moves.

  • Puzzle Challenges: Test yourself with 90 meticulously designed puzzles. Each challenge refines your skills, sharpening your tactical mind and fuelling continuous improvement.

  • Exquisite Rewards: Collect chess sets as you progress. From intricate walrus ivory to gleaming precious metals, every victory unlocks a new level of elegance, allowing you to personalise your chess experience, and show off your progress.

Step into Chess Infinity today and begin mastering your next move.

highlighted.name: Good Morning, Good Afternoon and Good Night

name: Chess Infinity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz 6 cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz 8 cores
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060 16GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space

short_description: Whether you're new to chess or a seasoned master, welcome to Chess Infinity—the art of timeless strategy. Immerse yourself in serene environments, sharpen your skills with an adaptive AI mentor, and connect with players worldwide. Embrace endless challenges that transcend eras and borders.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Portuguese - Portugal
